definition: to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉直覺和經驗，他彷彿找到了破解金元棒球的鑰匙。

sentences.english: Humans are sovereign beings by virtue of their indwelling adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 人的總稱憑藉他們的內涵調節器，是至高無上的存在。

sentences.english: Ms Stefanie Sun burst onto the Chinese music scene with her eponymous debut album in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 孫燕姿在2000年憑藉同名專輯進入華語樂壇。

sentences.english: The network teaching means that the teachers and the students rely on the media to carry out the non face-to-face education.
sentences.chinese: 網絡教學是指師生憑藉媒體所進行的非面對面的教育。

sentences.english: Finally with all these hardwork and with the help of friends, this guy had set up his own company...
sentences.chinese: 憑藉着這份努力與朋友的幫助，他有了他自己的公司。

sentences.english: Chen Daoming received the Best Performance award for his role in the film.
sentences.chinese: 陳道明憑藉在此片中的演出獲最佳男演員獎。

sentences.english: Zhou has attracted a great deal of interest because of his length and polished skills.
sentences.chinese: 憑藉着身高和技術，周琦引起了很多球隊的興趣。

sentences.english: What in the name of God is going on there?
sentences.chinese: 我們憑藉着上帝的名義將要去向何處？

sentences.english: Minelli and Grey won theirs for their respective turns in Cabaret.
sentences.chinese: 明奈利和格雷分別憑藉其在《酒店》裏的角色獲獎。

sentences.english: Disclosure and herausfordern is accomplished depending on technology.
sentences.chinese: “解蔽”或“促逼”是人類憑藉技術所達成的。

sentences.english: With its triangular shape, Kolding Campus will create a significant new landmark in Kolding.
sentences.chinese: 科靈校園將憑藉其三角形體創建出科靈的新地標。

sentences.english: The brand is fighting back with technology; one example is Kleenex Facial Tissue with Lotion.
sentences.chinese: 該品牌憑藉科技發起反擊，比如帶乳液的舒潔面巾紙。

sentences.english: Thou didst desert, with spirit-winged lightness.
sentences.chinese: 你憑藉心靈羽翼的輕盈。

sentences.english: Jiang Wenli more with Golden Eagle TV Festival The show won three awards.
sentences.chinese: 蔣雯麗更憑藉此劇在金鷹電視節包攬三項大獎。

sentences.english: He became famous for his great strength and great skill in cutting trees.
sentences.chinese: 他憑藉伐樹時強大的力量和高超的技藝變得出名。

sentences.english: He had led a cloistered existence and had little experience of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 除了天生的穎悟和日常舞臺經驗外，他沒有任何憑藉。

definition: to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
to focus/to concentrate/to give one's full attention
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
